answers.answer: Diabetes can often cause a digestive problem called diabetic gastroparesis.  If it is bad enough, a liquid diet is most helpful.

question: I am  62 year male with diabetes and Gerd.A few weeks ago I had some stomach problems with a lot of gurgling  and gas.  That has gone away but has left me with this vibrating or flutteryfeeling in my lower stomachand intestines.i ave no pain, my weight is stable , and my apatite is good. When I am working I don't notice it. When I try to sleep, it really bothers me and when I sit down to watch tv at night it is annoying.Help 1
title: muscle vibrations
